model

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Document
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocObservable, ShapeObserver

    public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
implements DocObservable, ShapeObserver

    Title: Document

    Description: Class that represents an implementation of a observable document

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003 Mohammed Elghaouat, Eric Paquette, Colin B-B

    Company: (ÉTS) - École de Technologie Supérieure

    Version:
    $Revision: 1.13 $
    Author:
    unascribed
